title: Sword of Chaos
content:
specifies that you are required to hit something, it doesn't specify if it is an enemy or an object, hitting and dealing damage to objects will restore health, attack common items like candles, chests, crates and so on and regain health in the process, if the damage dealt is 0 (happens when you attack a very tough chests/doors) you will not regain health from that hit.

All Weapons in Baldur's Gate 3 Adamantine Longsword ♦ Adamantine Mace ♦ Adamantine Scimitar ♦ Air Myrmidon Flail ♦ Allandra's W
